name: Dungeon Game Demo
description:
This is a game I'm working on, i don't have a name for it right now so im just gonna call it dungeon game

in dungeon game all you can do is run and you cant attack.

dungeon game has no music yet(since im bad at making music), but the only audio is a death sound.

the game also has controller support and ill add music and more sounds to the demo later.

thats all i really know what to write about.
